title: Jim Belushi
summary: James Adam Belushi[1] (/bəˈluːʃi/; born June 15, 1954) is an American actor and comedian. He is best known for the role of Jim on the sitcom According to Jim (2001–2009). His other television roles include Saturday Night Live (1983–1985), Wild Palms (1993), Aaahh!!! Real Monsters (1994–1997), Show Me a Hero (2015), and Twin Peaks (2017).
